display_long_description:
# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!
[media]
# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
[media]
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
[media]
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
[media]
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
[media]

Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!

# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822897_2207211333017644_8618162970932046056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=iBK4f59Qmy0Q7kNvwFjMuxC&_nc_oc=AdnpaL3LO2yciH6jsqC4SclN7z8Gf63k7HZ61puim6XFHHaGsYXdhqICtxk534lSR3c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=mOxXwZNw9A83OGvO4qEJ1w&oh=00_AfpvTvcyLASYEN1FiH2La1N73Y4j16C0nxwhTMwLGM80SQ&oe=696C4321)
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.

# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_1952193972016857_1573896307480103320_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=cRA9rxQ2fg8Q7kNvwF-_3e8&_nc_oc=AdkV-k8qSW8tUuK5BnNqd_hC-klDaILcSMjmfTT-CC1VjWTNlVAmnbc0diuTdpXMGvA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=mOxXwZNw9A83OGvO4qEJ1w&oh=00_AfqJ4hjuv0ZZOjSaHnGIfnVgxZEDw0dh-Ra3u1edepw3tQ&oe=696C4252)
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
